comments: a(n,m)= coefficient of x^m of ((1-x+sqrt(x))^n + (1-x-sqrt(x))^n)/2.The row polynomial pFe(m+1,x) := sum(a(m+1,k)*x^k,k=0..m+1) is the numerator of the g.f. for the m-th column sequence of A060920, the even part of the bisected Fibonacci triangle.
formula: a(n, m)= sum(((-1)^(m-j))*binomial(n, 2*j)*binomial(n-2*j, m-j), j=0..m), if 0<= m <= floor(n/2); a(n, m) := ((-1)^n)*a(n, n-m) if floor(n/2) < m <= n; else 0.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
